description:
Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bouken Kaimaku: Maboroshi no Shima "Zou" Touchaku!
Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!
Ein neues Abenteuer beginnt – Ankunft auf der Phantominsel Zou!
El comienzo de una nueva aventura - ¡Llegada a la isla misteriosa, Zou!
Le rideau se lève sur une nouvelle aventure. Arrivée sur l`île fantôme, Zō !
Una nuova avventura - La leggendaria isola di Zo!
Начало нового приключения! Прибытие на таинственный остров Зоя!
يُسدل السّتار على مغامرة جديدة! الوصول إلى الجزيرة الشّبح زو!
冒険開幕 幻の島「ゾウ」到着!
